title: Remove date range block from Experience entries

requirements.text: Remove the date-range UI block (Calendar icon SVG and the startDateâ€“endDate text span) from each experience card header in the Experience section, so those elements no longer render.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Experience section, the Calendar icon is not visible anywhere in experience entries.
In the Experience section, the date text ("{startDate} - {endDate}") is not visible anywhere in experience entries.
The Experience card header layout has no empty vertical gap where the removed date block used to be.
Other header elements (role, company, and optional location) still render correctly.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.
nonGoals: Do not change any CV data content in frontend/src/data/cv.ts.
Do not add new sections or features outside removing the specified Experience date block.
